Package io.anserini.index.generator

Class LuceneDocumentGenerator<T extends SourceDocument>

java.lang.Object
io.anserini.index.generator.LuceneDocumentGenerator<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of the source document
Direct Known Subclasses:
JsoupGenerator, NYUGenerator, TweetGenerator, WapoGenerator
public class LuceneDocumentGenerator<T extends SourceDocument>
extends java.lang.Object
Converts a SourceDocument into a Lucene Document, ready to be indexed. Prior to the creation of the Lucene document, this class will apply an optional StringTransform to, for example, clean HTML document.
